instructions:
**This is a Character Sheet for Warhammer Fantasy 4e inspired by the classic 2e version**

 Optional use of TokenMod API for Condition Token Marker setting/unsetting, requires my custom WFRP4e Tokens  (download @ https://github.com/Djjus/Vault/blob/master/Warhammer%204e%20Character%20Sheet/markers/WFRP4eset1.0.zip).
